page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The ways in which people are employed around the Pulloxhill area are extremely varied.This must be one of the biggest changes in the last 50 years.Instead of a workforce consisting mainly of farmworkers, there is no one important form of work.Most people travel outside the area to work.There are a few unemployed people and quite a lot of retired folk.Of the remainder there are people who are:aircraft engineer,airline-coordinator,bakery supervisor,buyer,car delivery driver, carpenter,database assistant,designer, electrician,farmer,fireman,insurance agent,local government workers,motor mechanic,nurse,school dinner assistant,school caretaker and shop assistant.
